name: Dogmelon Solitaire 5 Pack
description:
• • Why limit yourself to one type of solitaire, when you can enjoy 5 different solitaire games- for free! • •

This app is packed full of features, including...

• 5 Fun solitaire games to play
• Works on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad
• HD Retina display support
• Detailed help, to easily learn new games
• Great sound effects
• Automatic saving/loading
• Great cardbacks and backgrounds.
• Fireworks when you finish a game!

The games available are...

• Freecell
• Golf Solitaire
• Klondike
• Pyramid Solitaire
• Yukon

Why not check it out today?
